subject: Question regarding the Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I have a question regarding the VAM Pro Haptic Reactors. If I am ordering
the bundle with the power supply to germany, does the power supply comes
with a power plug for germany? I am asking because the product photo shows
a power plug which will not fit in the german system.

Thank you very much! Really looking forward hearing from you :)


Best regards,
Haris Murselji

conversations.body_text: Hi hmu racing,    Don't worry, we will send you the appropriate plug based on the shipping address. For Germany, we will send you a European plug.
